short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps prevent phishing by offering protection against an IDN homograph attack.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can automatically alert you if you try to access websites that might be trying to impersonate another website.

Clicked a link?
To get an indication if the website is legitimate, click the NoPhish extension icon in the top right of your browser window. If the URL that appears does not resemble the URL in the address bar, the website might not be legitimate.
